soot.jimple.toolkits.pointer

Class LocalTypeSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.BitSet
      • soot.jimple.toolkits.pointer.LocalTypeSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

     class LocalTypeSet
extends java.util.BitSet
    Represents a set of (local,type) pairs using a bit-vector.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.util.List<Local> locals 
      protected java.util.List<Type> types 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalTypeSet(java.util.List<Local> locals, java.util.List<Type> types)
      Constructs a new empty set given a list of all locals and types that may ever be in the set.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearAllBits()
      Empties the set.
      protected int indexOf(Local l, RefType t)
      Returns the number of the bit corresponding to the pair (l,t).
      void killLocal(Local l)
      Removes all pairs corresponding to local l from the set.
      void localCopy(Local to, Local from)
      For each pair (from,t), adds a pair (to,t).
      void localMustBeSubtypeOf(Local l, RefType t)
      Adds to the set all pairs (l,type) where type is any supertype of t.
      void setAllBits()
      Fills the set to contain all possible (local,type) pairs.
      java.lang.String toString()
